snippet: European authorities are homing in on Tan Seet Eng, called “the boss,” as they examine a scandal that could involve hundreds of soccer games.
abstract: European authorities are focusing on Singaporean man Tan Seet Eng as they examine a game-fixing scandal that could involve hundreds of soccer games; little is known about Tan, other than his power and that his match-fixing syndicate flourished for years.

byline.original: By GAIA PIANIGIANI and THOMAS FULLER

lead_paragraph: European authorities are homing in on Tan Seet Eng, called “the boss,” as they examine a scandal that could involve hundreds of soccer games.

headline.seo: Soccer Fixing Inquiry Hinges On a Shadowy Singaporean
headline.main: Soccer Fixing Inquiry Hinges on a Shadowy Singaporean
headline.print_headline: Soccer Fixing Inquiry Hinges On a Shadowy Singaporean
